Hello all,
     I'm trying to analyze the hierarchy of some crawled pages. =
From a
CrawlURI object, is there any way to get the hierarchy of referral
U=
RI's all the way up to the seed?
     I see the getVia() method on Candidat=
eURI, but that returns just
a UURI, which in turn doesn't have it's own get=
Via() call. So, I'm
stuck at just one level up from the CrawlURI I am query=
ing.
